Families

Complete your ShiftSitter onboarding

Add a few details so we can verify your profile, understand your schedule, and match you with nearby families for reciprocal care.

  • Designed for shift schedules: nights, weekends, rotating weeks.
  • Matches pair you with nearby parents who share availability and values.
  • Introductions happen before any swap so everyone feels ready.
